item.Q:
Write the character:
(negative prefix); not; no
item.A:
bù
不能 bùnéng cannot; must not; should not

wǒ
我们 (我們) wǒmen we; us; ourselves

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: big; huge; large; major; great; wide; deep; oldest; eldest
2: doctor
item.A:
1: dà 2: dài
广大 (廣大) guǎngdà vast; extensive 大夫 dàifu doctor; minister of state (in pre-Han states)

nǐ
你们 (你們) nǐmen you (plural)

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: good; well
2: to be fond of
item.A:
1: hǎo 2: hào
好的 hǎode (adj) OK 爱好 (愛好) àihào to like; to be fond of; to be keen on; interest; hobby

traditional: 學
xué
学习 (學習) xuéxí to learn; to study

tā
他们 (他們) tāmen they

tiān
今天 jīntiān today; at the present; now

item.Q:

small; tiny; few; young
item.A:
xiǎo
小孩 xiǎohái child

xièxie to thank
